sense.name: make a loud howling noise
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent[animate]] HOWL (PP[manner]) NP1[agent[animate]] HOWL NP2[message] NP1[theme] HOWL (PP[direction]) Note: Includes animate and inanimate howlers.
sense.examples: The wind was howling in the trees. OMFG, I'm howling with laughter here!!! Cat dumping has readers howling for equal justice. He howled a howl that could only be compared to the wolf man. And indeed it was wolves who howled an answer. John howled when Mary pulled off the band-aid.
